detail_desc: Playsuit in cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves, a round neckline and press-studs at the back. Side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front.

Playsuit in soft lace with flounces at the top and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist, and short legs. Jersey lining.

Round shoulder bag with a shimmering metallic finish, glittery appliqué, zip at the top and narrow shoulder strap. Lined. Width 4 cm, diameter approx. 13 cm.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave. Round neckline with gathers at the front and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and an elasticated seam with a detachable tie belt under the bust. Jersey lining.
Poncho in a soft jacquard knit containing glittery threads and sequins with a ribbed polo neck and fringed hem.

Trousers in imitation leather with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with a decorative seam at the front and slit at the hems.
Ankle-length trousers in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist. Side pockets, fake back pockets with a flap, flap leg pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Double-layered scarf soft faux fur. Width 25 cm, circumference 25 cm.

Knee-length skirt in soft leather with a concealed zip down the front that ends in a slit. Discreet side pockets. Lined.

Non-wired bra in an airy silk blend with lace sections. Lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Set with a short-sleeved top, pair of puff pants and hairband in soft cotton jersey. Top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, embroidery on the front and a seam with an embroidered trim at the top and hem. Puff pants with elastication at the waist and hems. Double-layered hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.

Set with a top and pair of puff pants in soft cotton jersey. Sleeveless top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and a lace trim at the hem. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and a frill trim around the hems.

Set with a top and pair of puff pants in soft cotton jersey. Sleeveless top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and a lace trim at the hem. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and a frill trim around the hems.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton. T-shirt in slub jersey with a print motif on the front, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Gently rounded and longer at the back. Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton. T-shirt in slub jersey with a print motif on the front, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Long parka in a cotton weave with a stand-up collar and jersey-lined hood with a drawstring. Zip and button band with press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press stud, and a drawstring at the waist. Tab with a press-stud at the cuffs and a gently rounded hem with a vent and drawstring at the back. Slightly longer at the back. Jersey lining.

Set with a tunic and pair of leggings. Tunic in soft, lightweight denim made from a cotton and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with decorative frills, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with an opening and button at the cuffs. Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.

Set with a sleeveless dress, pair of puff pants and a sun hat in jacquard-patterned jersey. Dress with a frill-trimmed yoke at the front and press-studs at the back. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and narrow elastication with a frill trim at the hems. Sun hat with ties under the chin and a picot trim around the brim. Width of brim 4 cm.

Microfibre shaping briefs that hold in and shape the waist. High waist with elastication and a concealed silicone trim. Folded, glued seams around the leg openings for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes.
